data.title: James (Jim) Foley
data.meta_site_name: Sheridan Center for Teaching and Learning | Brown University
data.text:
Contact me for:

Launching an online course or program

Departmental partnerships and initiatives

Digital usability, privacy, and compliance

Jim earned a BA in Communication and English from Roberts Wesleyan College. After short stints at the George Eastman House Museum and Xerox, he returned to academia by taking a position in the Online Learning department at the Rochester Institute of Technology. He subsequently earned his MS in Information Technology from RIT, concentrating in Usability Engineering and Instructional Technology.
